responses.response: Go to Settings > Age Verification and choose a method: VerifyMy ($0.50-$1.50), ID upload (free), credit card (free), or AI estimation (free).
Check your email for 'Statement of Reasons' explaining why. You can appeal via Compliance Dashboard > Appeals within 30 days.
VerifyMy: $0.50-$1.50. ID upload, credit card, and AI estimation are FREE. Choose based on your preferences.
Check email for suspension reason. Second strike = 7-day suspension. Complete required training to lift suspension after period ends.
Go to Compliance Dashboard > Appeals, select the content/action, provide your reasoning, and submit. Appeals reviewed within 7 days.
Report immediately via Report button. CSAM is a federal crime - we report to NCMEC within 24 hours. Zero tolerance.
Settings > Account > Delete Account. Pending payouts processed within 30 days. Some data retained for legal compliance.
Settings > Privacy > Data Requests. Choose request type (access, deletion, etc.). Response within 30 days per GDPR.
9 prohibited categories: CSAM, minors, incest, bestiality, non-consent, necrophilia, excrement, extreme violence, trafficking.
4 methods available: VerifyMy (recommended), ID document upload, credit card verification, or AI age estimation.
Check: file size limits, format support, and internet connection. Try smaller file or different format. Contact support if persists.
Content violated Visa/Mastercard rules. Check Statement of Reasons. Review prohibited content list before re-uploading.
3 strikes = permanent ban. Strike 1: warning. Strike 2: 7-day suspension. Strike 3: permanent ban. Strikes expire after 12 months.
18 U.S.C. 2257 requires age records for all performers in sexual content. Keep: ID copies, DOB, legal names, aliases for 7 years.
EU privacy law giving you rights: access, deletion, correction, portability, and objection. Submit requests via Settings > Privacy.
EU platform law requiring: 14-day complaint responses, Statement of Reasons for removals, appeals, and transparency reports.
Varies by type: account data (duration + 3 years), 2257 records (7 years), tax records (7 years). Request details in Settings > Privacy.
Viewers: after 3 years. Creators: 2257 requires 7-year retention. Submit deletion request via Settings > Privacy > Data Requests.
VPNs may cause verification issues. Disable VPN during verification, re-enable after. Using VPN to evade requirements = ToS violation.
Common causes: blurry image, expired ID, VPN active, or info mismatch. Try again or use different verification method.
Check: clear photo, not expired, full document visible, accepted type (passport, driver's license, national ID). Retry or try different method.
Government-issued photo ID: passport, driver's license, or national ID card. Must be valid (not expired) and clearly readable.
No, expired IDs are not accepted. Document must be valid at time of verification. Renew your ID or use alternative method.
Try: different card, check card isn't blocked for online use, try debit card, or use alternative verification method.
AI estimation is less accurate for ages 18-24. Use ID upload or credit card verification instead. No penalty for AI failure.
NO. 'Barely legal' and 'teen' framing is prohibited even if all performers are 18+. Emphasizing youth in sexual context is banned.
NO. ALL incest content is prohibited, including roleplay and step-family scenarios. Payment processors ban this category entirely.
NO. School uniforms in sexual content are prohibited - they suggest minors. Use clearly adult/professional attire instead.
NO. Age play (roleplaying as minors) is prohibited in sexual content. This includes childlike behavior, speech, or items in sexual context.
Yes, consensual BDSM is allowed with documented consent and proper content warnings. Prohibited: extreme injury, non-consent without CNC disclaimer.
Report immediately via Report button. We monitor 13 indicators and report to FBI when critical. Hotline: 1-888-373-7888.
Click Report button on content, select violation type, provide details, submit. Reports reviewed within 24-72 hours.
Statement of Reasons is sent via email and available in Compliance Dashboard. It explains violation, affected content, action taken, and appeal options.
Appeals must be submitted within 30 days of decision. Appeals reviewed by different moderator within 7 days of submission.
Review times: CSAM (immediate), high-risk (8 hours), medium (24 hours), standard (72 hours). Check content status in Creator Dashboard.
Most permanent bans can be appealed within 30 days via compliance@fanz.com. Exception: CSAM bans cannot be appealed.
First strike: warning issued, content removed, mandatory refresher training. Account remains active. 2 more strikes = permanent ban.
Second strike: 7-day suspension, content removed, additional training required, supervisor review. One more strike = permanent ban.
Third strike: permanent account ban, all content removed, cannot create new accounts. Appeal within 30 days via compliance@fanz.com.
0-39=Low (auto-approve), 40-59=Medium (spot-check), 60-79=High (mandatory review), 80-100=Critical (auto-block). Based on content analysis.
Settings > Compliance Dashboard. View violations, submit appeals, check training status, submit data requests, contact support.
Settings > Training > Certifications. Shows completed certifications, expiration dates, and renewal requirements.
Certifications require annual renewal. Complete refresher course (shorter than original) and pass knowledge check. Set reminders in Settings.
Try: clear browser cache, different browser, disable extensions. If persists, contact support@fanz.com with error details.
Review course materials - all answers are covered in training. No cheating - certifications ensure you understand compliance requirements.
Review your results to see which areas need study. Retake after waiting period (varies by course). Unlimited attempts allowed.
Wait period varies by course (24 hours to 7 days). Review feedback on missed questions. Study those topics before retaking.
Complete Creator Compliance certification (85% pass rate) to enable monetization. Go to Settings > Training > Creator Compliance.
Complete Creator Compliance course in FanzVarsity (Settings > Training). Pass with 85% to unlock monetization features.
Moderator positions require Moderator Training certification (90% pass). Apply via careers@fanz.com after certification.
Before filming: verify ID, record legal name/DOB, document aliases, get signed consent. Upload records in Creator Dashboard > Collaborators.
Document consent before production: signed form, performer IDs verified, specify content type and distribution platforms. Keep for 7 years.
Designated person responsible for 2257 records. Their name/address must appear in content. Must produce records within 20 minutes if inspected.
FBI can inspect 2257 records with ~48 hours notice. Records must be retrievable within 20 minutes. Keep records organized and current.
2257 records: 7 years from last publication. GDPR requests: 3 years. Tax records: 7 years. CSAM reports: permanent.
Available at: website footer, Settings > Privacy > View Privacy Policy, and /privacy-policy. Updated annually or when changes occur.
Full Terms of Service at /terms-of-service and in Settings > Legal. By using Fanz, you agree to these terms.
In-app chat (fastest), email support@fanz.com, or Settings > Help. For compliance: compliance@fanz.com. For emergencies: trust@fanz.com.
Report via Settings > Help > Report Bug. Include: what happened, steps to reproduce, device/browser info, screenshots if possible.
Submit via Settings > Help > Feature Request or community forums. We review suggestions during product planning.
Click 'Forgot Password' on login page. Check email (including spam). Link expires in 24 hours. Contact support if no email received.
Settings > Account > Email. Verification sent to new email. Old email notified of change for security. Some features may require re-verification.
Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. Required for creator accounts. Supports: authenticator apps, SMS, hardware keys.
Immediately: change password, enable 2FA, check Settings > Security > Login History, revoke unknown sessions, contact support@fanz.com.
Check: correct email, caps lock off, try password reset. If suspended, check email for reason. Clear cache/cookies. Contact support if persists.
Settings > Account > Deactivate. Temporarily hides profile/content. Reactivate by logging in. Different from permanent deletion.
Settings > Content > Export. Select content to download. Large exports processed overnight. For GDPR data export, use Privacy > Data Requests.
Settings > Profile > Display Name. Changes reflect immediately. Username changes may be limited to prevent confusion.
VerifyMy/card/AI: instant to 5 minutes. ID upload: up to 24 hours for manual review. Check status in Settings > Verification.
Check Settings > Verification for status. Try logging out and back in. Clear cache. If verified but blocked, contact support.
Multiple accounts allowed if: distinct purpose, same verified identity, no enforcement evasion. Creating accounts after ban = immediate ban.
Account sharing is prohibited. Each person needs their own verified account. Sharing credentials = security risk and ToS violation.
Third-party age verification service. They verify your age; Fanz only receives yes/no result. Cost: $0.50-$1.50. Fast and privacy-focused.
Yes. VerifyMy is certified, GDPR compliant, deletes data after verification, and doesn't share details with Fanz. Reputable service.
CNC allowed with: clear disclaimer, documented consent, no ambiguity, no weapons/extreme violence. Prohibited: drugging, realistic assault.
Required for: BDSM/kink, CNC, blood, intense themes. Add during upload. Missing warnings = violation. Over-warning is fine.
Same rules as recorded content plus: real-time age verification, enhanced monitoring, instant moderator controls. Violations = immediate stream end + standard enforcement.
Same compliance applies: all performers verified, consent documented, prohibited content cannot be commissioned even if requested.
Tips are taxable income. Don't promise prohibited content for tips. Unusual tip patterns may trigger trafficking review.
Clear description required, easy cancellation, no prohibited content promises. Auto-renewal needs clear disclosure.
Payouts processed weekly on Fridays for earnings cleared from previous period. Minimum threshold: $50. Check Settings > Payments.
US creators: W-9 before first payout over $600. Non-US: W-8BEN. Submit via Settings > Payments > Tax Documents.
US creators earning $600+ receive 1099-NEC in January. Reports gross payments. You're responsible for filing taxes.
High chargebacks = processor scrutiny. Maintain clear descriptions, deliver promised content. Excessive chargebacks may suspend monetization.
Settings > Payments > Payment Methods > Add. Supports major credit/debit cards. PayPal available in some regions.
Contact creator first for resolution. If unresolved, Settings > Payments > Disputes. Refunds evaluated case-by-case.
For your stolen content: Settings > Content Protection > DMCA. Fill required fields. Processed within 24 hours.
Settings > Content Protection > Report Piracy. Provide URLs where your content appears. We assist with external takedowns.
Fanz adds invisible metadata watermarks. Visible watermarks optional (Settings > Content > Watermark). Helps identify original creator.
On user's profile or message: click Block. Blocked users can't see your content, message you, or interact. Manage in Settings > Privacy > Blocked.
On user's profile: click Report. Select reason, provide details. Reports reviewed within 24-72 hours. Report confidentially.
Block the user, report via Report button or trust@fanz.com. Save evidence. Serious cases reported to law enforcement.
Report via trust@fanz.com immediately. Provide: URLs, how to identify you in content. Removed within 24 hours. We preserve evidence for legal action.
Non-consensual deepfakes prohibited. Consensual AI content requires: documented consent, clear AI labeling, 18+ verification. No AI-generated CSAM.
Multiple niche platforms (boyfanz, girlfanz, etc.) with shared FanzSSO login. One verification works across all. Core policies consistent.
One account for all Fanz platforms. Verify once, access everywhere. Compliance status syncs. Login at any platform works for all.
Compliance training platform at Settings > Training. Interactive courses, certifications, knowledge checks. Required for certain features/roles.
Required course for all users. 45-60 min, 80% pass rate. Covers: laws, prohibited content, reporting. Complete via Settings > Training.
Creator Compliance course: 2-3 hours, 85% pass. Covers 2257, consent, taxes, platform rules. Required for monetization.
Searchable help at kb.fanz.website. Covers compliance, features, troubleshooting. Updated continuously.
Content can be distributed to connected platforms. Must meet both Fanz and destination platform policies. Strictest rules apply.
When distributing to external platforms, content checked against their policies too. Rejection from external doesn't count as Fanz violation.
Some content geo-restricted by law or creator choice. VPNs detected. If incorrectly blocked, contact support with proof of location.
Some jurisdictions require device verification. New devices may need re-verification. Manage in Settings > Security > Trusted Devices.
Settings > Notifications. Control: marketing, compliance alerts, payout notifications, security alerts. Compliance/security alerts cannot be fully disabled.
Settings > Privacy. Control: profile visibility, message permissions, activity visibility, data sharing preferences.
Settings > Content. Default settings for: content warnings, distribution, geo-restrictions, watermarks, and more.
Report immediately to trust@fanz.com. Don't pay. Save evidence. Sextortion is a crime. We cooperate with law enforcement.
If you're in crisis: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline 988, Crisis Text Line text HOME to 741741. Your wellbeing matters.
National Human Trafficking Hotline: 1-888-373-7888 or text HELP to 233733. 24/7 support for victims and those who encounter trafficking.
If LE contacts you: don't panic, don't destroy evidence, note their details, you can ask for time to consult attorney. Contact support if about Fanz content.
For legal process regarding your account: contact legal@fanz.com. We handle valid legal requests through proper channels.
Check email for breach notifications. Change password if affected. We notify users and authorities within 72 hours if breach affects you.
Published at /transparency. Shows: moderation actions, complaint handling, automated decisions. Updated quarterly per DSA.
After exhausting internal appeals, EU users can escalate to Out-of-Court Dispute Resolution. Details at Settings > Compliance > ODR.
Data Protection Officer contact: dpo@fanz.com. For GDPR inquiries, privacy concerns, and data protection matters.
EU representative details in privacy policy. Contact point for EU supervisory authorities and data subjects.
Settings > Privacy > Cookie Preferences. Control: necessary (can't disable), functional, analytics, marketing cookies.
Settings > Notifications > Marketing. Unsubscribe link in emails. Marketing can be fully opted out; compliance alerts cannot.
Settings > Accessibility. Features: screen reader support, keyboard navigation, color contrast, text resizing. Report issues to accessibility@fanz.com.
Native apps available for iOS and Android. Download from App Store / Play Store. Same account works across web and app.
Supported: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge (latest versions). Enable JavaScript and cookies. Clear cache if issues occur.
Videos: up to 4GB. Images: up to 50MB. For larger files, compress or split into parts. Check Settings > Content for limits.
Video: MP4, MOV, AVI. Image: JPG, PNG, GIF. Audio: MP3, WAV. Other formats may be converted or rejected.
Upload highest quality available. We transcode for optimal delivery. Supported up to 4K. Lower resolutions stream faster on slow connections.
During upload: set publish date/time. Content reviewed before scheduled time. Cancel scheduled posts anytime before publication.
Creator Dashboard > Analytics. View: views, subscribers, earnings, engagement. Export reports for accounting.
Use: hashtags, engage with followers, cross-promote, quality content. Paid promotion available in some regions. No spam.
No CSAM, illegal content, harassment, or soliciting minors in DMs. Messages scanned for prohibited content. Report concerning messages.
Group messaging available for subscribers. Same rules as DMs. Creator controls who can join. Report violations.
Creator Dashboard > Messages > Broadcast. Can message all subscribers at once. Don't spam. Include unsubscribe option.
Creator Dashboard > Monetization > Pricing. Set subscription rates, PPV prices, tips enabled. Check competitive pricing in your niche.
Free posts are allowed. Mix free and paid content. Free content still must comply with all policies.
Create bundles in Creator Dashboard > Content > Bundles. All content in bundle must individually comply. Discount pricing available.
Offer free trials via Creator Dashboard > Monetization > Promotions. Set duration. Trials convert to paid after period.
Settings > Referrals. Share unique link. Earn when referred users subscribe/purchase. Terms and payouts in referral dashboard.
Affiliate program for promoters. Apply at affiliates.fanz.com. Requires active account in good standing.
Complete creator verification (ID, address, tax docs). Badge appears after approval (24-48 hours). Shows identity is confirmed.
Settings > Profile. Add: photo, bio, links. Creator profiles need verification. Complete profiles perform better.
Settings > Profile > Cover Photo. Recommended: 1920x480px. Compliant content only. Represents your brand.
Settings > Linked Accounts. Connect: Twitter, Instagram (display links). Verify ownership. For content distribution, see Integrations.
18+ required for all users. No exceptions. Under 18 = account termination. Creating content involving minors = federal crime.
Report to trust@fanz.com with: evidence, your identity verification. We investigate and remove fraudulent accounts.
Report via Report > Impersonation on the fake profile. Provide: your identity proof, evidence of impersonation. Removed within 24-48 hours.
Report scams to trust@fanz.com. Don't send money off-platform. Fanz never asks for passwords. Verify creator identity before purchasing.
Report via Report > Hate Speech. Zero tolerance for discrimination. Offenders are banned. We cooperate with authorities for threats.
Report via Report > Spam. Block the user. We investigate patterns. Spam networks are banned. Don't engage with spam.
Report IMMEDIATELY via Report > Underage User. Do not interact. Account investigated and terminated if underage confirmed.
Report immediately to trust@fanz.com. Save evidence. Serious threats reported to law enforcement. Your safety is priority.
Block user, report to trust@fanz.com. Document incidents. Consider local law enforcement report. We provide records for investigations.
National Center for Missing & Exploited Children. We report all CSAM to NCMEC CyberTipline within 24 hours as required by law.
Microsoft technology matching content against known CSAM database. Matches trigger immediate blocking and NCMEC report.
Appeals reviewed within 7 days by different moderator. Complex cases may take longer. Status in Compliance Dashboard.
AI can make mistakes. Appeal via Compliance Dashboard. Provide context explaining why content complies. About 30-40% of appeals succeed.
All flagged content gets human review before final action. Appeals get second human review. Request via Compliance Dashboard if concerned.
GDPR gives you right to human review of automated decisions. Request via appeal process. All significant actions have human verification.
View in Compliance Dashboard. 0-100 based on: training, verification, violations, response time. Below 70 may limit features.
Strikes expire 12 months from violation date. History retained permanently for pattern analysis but expired strikes don't count toward 3-strike limit.
If banned, you'll see message on login attempt. Check email for notification and reason. Appeal permanent bans via compliance@fanz.com within 30 days.
Creating new accounts after permanent ban is prohibited and detected. Evasion = immediate ban of new account. One chance only.
Organizations with expertise in detecting illegal content. Their reports get priority review. Examples: NCMEC, IWF.
Content may be held pending: higher-risk review, verification check, compliance request. Different from violation. Resolve in Compliance Dashboard.
Some verifications need periodic refresh (annually in some jurisdictions). Notification sent before deadline. Refresh via Settings > Verification.
Update verification after getting new ID: Settings > Verification > Update Documents. Maintains continuous verification status.
Update address: Settings > Account > Address. May require re-verification for creators. Important for tax and legal purposes.
Update legal name: Settings > Account > Legal Name. Requires documentation. Takes 24-48 hours to process.
Business accounts for studios/agencies. Contact business@fanz.com. Requires business documentation. Individual performers still need individual verification.
API for business integration available. Apply via developers.fanz.com. Requires business account in good standing.
Webhooks available for compliance events, content status. Configure in API dashboard. Documentation at developers.fanz.com.
Embedding may be enabled in content settings. Embedded content still requires viewer age verification in regulated jurisdictions.
DRM and technical measures limit downloading. Watermarks help identify source if leaked. 100% prevention impossible but deterred.
Settings > Content > Export for your backup. We maintain platform backups but recommend keeping your own copies.
Self-deleted content recoverable for 30 days via Settings > Content > Trash. After 30 days, permanently deleted.
Archive content to hide from profile while keeping it: Content > Archive. Subscribers with access still see archived content.
Pin content to profile top: Content > Pin. Up to 3 pins. Good for showcasing best content to new visitors.
Add tags during upload or edit. Use relevant tags for discoverability. Prohibited terms in tags = violation.
Thumbnail auto-generated or upload custom. Must be compliant (no explicit in thumbnail if geo-restricted). SFW preview option.
Set free preview length in upload settings. Previews help conversion. Ensure preview is compliant standalone.
Create series in Creator Dashboard > Collections. Link related content. Helps organization and viewer experience.
Set revenue splits for collaborations in Creator Dashboard > Collaborators > Revenue Split. All collaborators must be verified.
Settings > Payments > Payout Methods. Options: direct deposit, PayPal (some regions), wire transfer. Verify identity for first payout.
Minimum payout: $50. Earnings accumulate until threshold met. Check balance in Creator Dashboard > Earnings.
Earnings have holding period before payout. Check Creator Dashboard > Earnings for clearance dates. Usually 7-14 days.
Earnings in USD. Conversion rates at payout time. Some payout methods have fees for non-USD. Check Settings > Payments.
Creator Dashboard > Earnings > Export. Download CSV/PDF for accounting. Include date range and transaction types.
Creator Dashboard > Subscribers. See active subscribers, renewal dates, subscription tiers. Export for marketing.
You can block subscribers but can't force unsubscribe. Blocked users can't renew. Their access ends at period end.
View in Creator Dashboard. Followers = free follows. Subscribers = paying. Both shown on public profile.
Creator Dashboard > Analytics > Engagement. Shows: likes, comments, shares, saves. Compare over time.
Creator Dashboard > Fans > Top Fans. See highest spenders. Consider thanking or special content for loyal fans.
Create polls in post composer. Good for engaging fans and getting content ideas. Results visible to you.
Interactive quizzes available. Fun engagement tool. Don't use for prohibited content requests.
Stories: 24-hour content. Post via + button > Story. Good for behind-scenes, casual content. Same policies apply.
Save stories to highlights: Story > Add to Highlights. Highlights stay on profile permanently. Organize by category.
Voice messages available in DMs. Record up to 60 seconds. Same content rules apply to audio.
Video calls available for verified creators. Schedule via DM. Recorded calls need consent. Pay-per-minute available.
Creator Dashboard > Goals. Set tip goals with descriptions. Shows progress publicly. Don't promise prohibited content.
Link wishlist in profile. Fans can purchase gifts. You ship; we don't handle physical items. Follow local laws.
Platform available in multiple languages. Settings > Language. Help articles primarily English. Translation expanding.
Check status.fanz.com for platform status. Shows: uptime, incidents, maintenance. Subscribe for notifications.
